OOC: Yuppers! RoboCop which was my favorite live action movie untill last years TF. I'm glad that the evil Rodimus story arc was suprising. Airly and I had been working on this and where it will evntually lead for a while.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:          OOC: That just blew my mind!  :P  Good job!  (BTW the reference is from Robocop!  I cheated though >.>)

  On Feb 12, 2008 12:07 AM, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
            
  ::Jhiaxus/Zarak/Hot Rod::
   
  Jhiaxus stayed close pounding the tar out of Hot Rod while the imagry helemt also began to upload new programming into Hot Rod's spark. To put it simply he was being reprogrammed into an evil, merciless Predacon. His memories, although not erased, were being fragmented. A directive in the programming that would remain secret to him unless it ever came up. Hot Rod would not be able to attack Hydras. The directive is labeled as: DIRECTIVE IV - NEVER OPPOSE PREDACON COMMANDER HYDRAS.(Kudos to anyone who tells me what the reference is from.)
   
  Zarak came into the room with some parts. Jhiaxus begins to install these updates. Now Hot Rod's wrist mounted old school lasers were replaced with rapid fireing plasma charge guns.(Imgine the yellowish bursts fired from most guns in BW rather then yellow versions of the steady beams that could be seen from Megatron II T-Rex head or Dinobots optics.)
   
  His over the shoulder rockets were replaced cylindrical mini-rocket launchers that could fire many.(Like Bumblebee has in the live actio movie.)
   
  Hot Rod's retractible circular saws from his wrist joints remain, at least in his right arm. The blade looks more sinister now. In his left joint a flame thrower now resides.
   
  Hot Rod's color scheme is also changed. The red, orange and yellow scheme is replaced by a black, purple and silver scheme. 
   
  As Jhiaxus leans in for a hit he secretly changes something in the programming. Hot Rod is still turned evil but is no longer changed into a Predacon rather a Generation 2 Decepticon. This is reflected by the insignia on his chest. He is also now programmed to except Jhiaxus' orders as the highest, even over Hydras.
   
  Jhiaxus steps back after removing the helmet. Hot Rod is still dorment but now unbound. Jhiaxus and Zarak leave the room and face Hydras.
   
  Jhiaxus: Dark Rodimus is ready.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
      Nightlight/Hdyras/perceptor:

Tears fell from Nightlight's eyes while she continued strugle, and 
she tried to scream calling Rodimus but the gag didnt allowed. 

Perceptor started the reprogramation process and he also downloaded 
several upgrades in his weapons and the uncondicional loyalty to 
Hdyras.

PErceptor continued worked while Hydras enjoyed his enemie's agony 
and Nightlight's grief.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Jhiaxus/Zarak/Hot Rod::
> 
> Zarak has the imaging helmet ready. It will flash the most 
horrible images of the evils commited in the past from all known 
races. They will come and change quickly. Everyone to be driven in 
and stored in Hot Rod's memory banks.
> 
> Jhiaxus walks into the room with the helmet. he slips it on Hot 
Rod's head and he begins.
> 
> In only second Hot Rod is letting out screams that one could not 
imagine.
> 
> Hot Rod: Turn it off! Primus, please! Turn it off! I can't take 
it! NOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!1
> 
> Just as Hot Rod is reaching his mental limit Jhiaxus cocks back 
and sends his right hand plowing into the lower torso region of Hot 
Rod's frame. Since Hot Rod is secure he cannot recoil from the attack 
or the pain. it come again. Again. Again and again. Finally a good 
shot is given across the jaw.
> 
> This continues on and on....
> 
> xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
> Hydras/Nightlight:
> 
> "do it when you're ready"hissed hydras while Nightlight's eyes 
opened 
> wide with horror and strugled tried to freed from her tied.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
> >
> > ::Jhiaxus::
> > 
> > Jhiaxus sits Nightlight down in a chair and secures her to it.
> > 
> > Jhiaxus: We're still going through with this? Alright then. Do we 
> have the imaging equipment to mentally break him while I physically 
> break him?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
